title: Frontend widget blank when ML API returns empty payload
core_issue: Frontend not handling null/empty API responses.
root_cause: ML API failed for emoji-only reviews (edge case).
solution: Update ML to handle emojis; add frontend fallback for null values.

title: Dashboard stalls due to slow API responses
core_issue: API response time exceeded frontend timeout.
root_cause: Missing async handling and retry logic in React component.
solution: Add timeout extension + retry; improve API caching.

title: Sentiment scoring inaccurate for mixed-language reviews
core_issue: ML model not trained for multi-language input.
root_cause: Dataset only contained English reviews; preprocessing ignores non-English text.
solution: Retrain model with multilingual dataset; add preprocessor to detect and translate non-English text.

title: Notification service sending duplicate alerts
core_issue: Duplicate webhook triggers for the same event.
root_cause: Retry logic triggers multiple webhook events on slow acknowledgments.
solution: Add deduplication layer in notification service; improve acknowledgement handling.

title: Mobile dashboard crashes on older Android versions
core_issue: Incompatible JS features in mobile webview.
root_cause: Polyfills missing for ES6+ functions used in React components.
solution: Add polyfills for older Android versions; test on device farm.

title: Backend service memory leak under heavy load
core_issue: Unreleased database connections accumulating in pool.
root_cause: Old DB connection handling logic did not close connections on exceptions.
solution: Refactor DB connection pool handling; add automated stress tests.
